FIREBASE_DATABASE.storageBucket: ---storage bucket url from firebase app config---

serviceAccount.type: ---account type from firebase service account credentials---
serviceAccount.project_id: ---project id from firebase service account credentials---
serviceAccount.private_key_id: ---p_key id from firebase service account credentials---
serviceAccount.private_key: ---service account private key from firebase service account credentials---
serviceAccount.client_id: ---client id from firebase service account credentials---
serviceAccount.auth_uri: ---auth uri from firebase service account credentials---
serviceAccount.token_uri: ---token uri from firebase service account credentials---
serviceAccount.auth_provider_x509_cert_url: ---provider url from firebase service account credentials---
serviceAccount.client_x509_cert_url: ---client cert url from firebase service account credentials---
